query: SELECT fj.id, fj.status, fj.completedProviders, fj.failedProviders, fj.totalProviders, ft.providerId, ft.status as taskStatus, ft.error FROM fetcherJobs fj LEFT JOIN fetcherTasks ft ON fj.id = ft.jobId ORDER BY fj.id DESC;
